EmailTemplate.name: FW: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement (1338309030.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement (1338309030.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi John, I clarified things with Frank and he is fine with working with MBO. He did have a question about the rate and said it was different than what you two had discussed and he asked you to give him a call. Once you two work that out let me know if there needs to be any changes made to the SOW (attached) and I will send the update. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 12:29 PM To: 'Frank Wilkens' Cc: dgeorge@wellcity.com Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Hi Frank, So nice speaking with you and clarifying MBO’s relationship and role in this agreement with Well City and John. I will have John reach out separately to discuss the rate. If you have any questions about our MSA please let me know. Again, I would be happy to work with your agreement if that is preferable to Well City. Also, I would be happy to list Well City as holder on our certificate of insurance once the contract is signed. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Frank Wilkens [mailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com] <mailto:[mailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 12:17 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: dgeorge@wellcity.com <mailto:dgeorge@wellcity.com> Subject: RE: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement John is already a 1099 contractor—if he wishes to hire your firm to assist him in managing his business; please direct any contracts to him as he would be your client not Wellcity. Frank From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 10:21 AM To: dgeorge@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:dgeorge@wellcity.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Cc: fwilkens@wellcity.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:fwilkens@wellcity.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>; john Mcmillin Subject: Well City_John McMillin_MBO Agreement Importance: High Dear David, My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by John McMillin. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfUZQuUxz5e%2B5NazhkzbJboHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
